input: The lessee shall pay rent on time.
target: The tenant must pay rent on time.

input: All notices must be in writing and delivered to the other party’s registered office.
target: All notices must be written and sent to the other party’s registered office.

input: This agreement may be terminated by either party with 30 days written notice.
target: Either party can end this agreement with 30 days’ written notice.

input: The supplier warrants that the goods conform to the specifications.
target: The supplier guarantees the goods meet the specifications.

input: Neither party shall be liable for indirect or consequential damages.
target: Neither side is responsible for indirect or consequential damages.

input: Confidential information shall not be disclosed without prior consent.
target: You must not share confidential information without prior consent.

input: The parties agree to resolve disputes through arbitration in accordance with ICC rules.
target: The parties will settle disputes by arbitration under ICC rules.

input: Force majeure events include, but are not limited to, acts of God.
target: Force majeure events include, but are not limited to, natural disasters.

input: This contract is governed by the laws of the State of California.
target: California state law governs this contract.

input: Any amendments to this agreement must be in writing and signed by both parties.
target: Any changes to this agreement must be written and signed by both parties.
